Name: Olympus Griddlers
About the game: The legendary Mount Olympus needs a new hero! Complete 120 unique levels and earn many fine Greek trophies. In each of the 6 luxurious stages, quests from Zeus, Athena, Hermes and the other legendary Gods of Mount Olympus await you. New and improved controls will help you to pass all the tests. More than 10 hours of gameplay accompanied by excellent Greek music! Help the Gods of Mount Olympus to decode ancient scrolls and become a hero of the legends of Greece! - A Japanese crossword game - 120 unique levels and 6 locations - More than 10 hours of gameplay with fine Greek music - New and improved controls - A trophy room and more than 15 luxurious trophies - Designed in the style of Ancient Greece
Meta Title: Olympus Griddlers: Aug 5, 2020, Creobit and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Olympus Griddlers? Check out the release date (Aug 5, 2020), developer insights from Creobit, and a complete game summary.
